title: Dhaka Imperial College, Dhaka, Bangladesh
text: Dhaka Imperial College is situated at Road No. 2, Jahurul Islam City, Aftabnagar, Badda, Dhaka-1212, Bangladesh.

title: How to get there
text: Dhaka Imperial College is located in Jahurul Islam City, Aftabnagar, Dhaka.It's easy to reach from Rampura, Badda, and Banasree.You can come by bus, car, CNG, or ride-sharing apps like Uber or Pathao.The campus is near Aftabnagar Main Road with clear directions available.
